required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of Mumps Vaccine
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled Phase Ⅳ Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of Mumps Vaccine in Healthy Infants Aged 8 ~12 Months.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of mumps vaccine in healthy infants aged 8-12months, compared with measles, mumps and rubella combined vaccine, live (MMRV).

detailed_description.textblock: The study is a randomized, double-blind, controlled phase Ⅳ clinical trial. And 920 infants will be assigned to investigational group and controlled group in a 1:1 ratio. The investigational vaccine is manufactured by Sinovac (Dalian) Vaccine Technology Co., Ltd. The controlled vaccine is manufactured by Shanghai institute of biological products Co., Ltd.

primary_outcome.measure: The seroconversion rate of hemagglutination inhibition (HI) antibody
primary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity index, One of the standard to evaluate the immunogenicity of experimental vaccine

secondary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity index, Another standard to evaluate the immunogenicity of experimental vaccine

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of the solicited local and systemic adverse reactions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from day 0 to day 14 after vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Safety index, The adverse reactions refers to the adverse events which were considered related to the vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of the unsolicited adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from day 0 to day 30 after immunization

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of the serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from day 0 to day 30 after immunization

arm_group.description: measles, mumps and rubella combined vaccine, live, one dose

intervention.description: One dose of mumps vaccine: 0.5 ml per dose, mumps live virus not less than 3.7 lg CCID50

intervention.intervention_name: measles, mumps and rubella combined vaccine, live
intervention.description: One dose of measles, mumps and rubella combined vaccine, live: 0.5 ml per dose, mumps live virus not less than 4.3 lg CCID50

overall_official.affiliation: Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Center for Disease Prevention and Control

facility.name: Hezhou Center for Disease Prevention and Control

clinical_study.keyword: measles, mumps and rubella combined vaccine, live
